meanings.definition: A person who delays or hinders progress.
meanings.sent1: The footdraggers in the team always made us late for meetings.
meanings.sent2: The footdraggers at the office slowed down the completion of the project.
meanings.sent3: The footdraggers in the group turned every task into a waiting game.
meanings.sent4: The footdraggers in the project were like anchors holding us back.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the footdraggers, for they can stall any plan in its tracks.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who are slow to act or make decisions.
meanings.sent1: We couldn't reach a conclusion due to the footdraggers in the committee.
meanings.sent2: The footdraggers in the team took forever to finalize their choices.
meanings.sent3: The footdraggers in the class made even simple tasks seem like marathons.
meanings.sent4: The footdraggers in the group were like turtles in a race against hares.
meanings.sent5: The footdraggers' indecisiveness caused frustration among the members.
